snippet.title: There is a Canadian Foreskin Awareness Project. Of course, Gene called
snippet.description: Gene interviews the founder of a foreskin awareness movement.

snippet.title: Is refusing to photograph a gay marriage properly considered discrimination based on sexual orientation?
snippet.description: It doesn't seem to make sense to argue that photographer who refuses to photograph a brit milah on moral grounds is discriminating based on religion, so why is refusing to photograph a gay wedding discrimination based on sexual orientation?

snippet.title: A small but growing number of Jews are questioning the ancient ritual of circumcision
snippet.description: Secular discomfort, mixed medical and a more flexible American religious culture fuel trend

snippet.title: Is circumcision a right?
snippet.description: Parents' right to freedom of religion may be trumped by childrens' right to physical integrity.

snippet.title: Medical advantages and religious rights of circumcision
Pritzker brothers played the feud, now they're motto is more like this: Let's make a deal
snippet.description: Investors Anthony and J.B. say they are ready to put their past fights with other relatives behind them.

snippet.title: (RESEND) African chief evangelizes about adult circumcision
snippet.description: African Chief Jonathan Eshiloni Mumena will eagerly tell you about his ivory Star of David ring and the Texas flag on his tie.
